text:
@narendramodi No planning. Only bol bachchan:

No financial package dedicated to fight Covid-19 has been released by centre for the states

Centre is falsely marking the zones as red, thereby impeding the restarting of industries

States share of GST is being withheld by Centre. 

#PMCareFraud
